Name: corerad
Description: CoreRAD is an extensible and observable IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Protocol router advertisement daemon. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: ndp
Description: Package ndp implements the Neighbor Discovery Protocol, as described in RFC 4861.  MIT Licensed.

Name: netlink
Description: Package netlink provides low-level access to Linux netlink sockets (AF_NETLINK). MIT Licensed.

Name: consrv
Description: Command consrv is a SSH to serial console bridge server, originally designed for deployment on gokrazy.org devices. Apache 2.0 Licensed.

Name: apcupsd_exporter
Description: Prometheus exporter that exposes metrics from apcupsd's NIS. MIT Licensed.

Name: packet
Description: Package packet provides access to Linux packet sockets (AF_PACKET). MIT Licensed.

Name: yamlnetlink
Description: Package yamlnetlink provides support for parsing YAML netlink specifications. MIT Licensed.

Name: prombolt
Description: Package prombolt provides a Prometheus metrics collector for Bolt databases.  MIT Licensed.

Name: ethtool
Description: Package ethtool allows control of the Linux ethtool generic netlink interface. MIT Licensed.

Name: apcupsd
Description: Package apcupsd provides a client for the apcupsd Network Information Server (NIS).  MIT Licensed.

Name: arp
Description: Package arp implements the ARP protocol, as described in RFC 826. MIT Licensed.

Name: homelab
Description: Configuration management for Matt Layher's machines. MIT Licensed.

Name: untappd
Description: Package untappd provides an Untappd APIv4 client, written in Go. MIT Licensed.

Name: ordered
Description: Package ordered implements data structures which maintain consistent ordering of inserted elements.

Name: wireguard_exporter
Description: Command wireguard_exporter implements a Prometheus exporter for WireGuard devices. MIT Licensed.
